main event: On July 10, 1958, an officer at Pope AFB, N.C. observed a rapidly changing altitude object while in the control tower.
interesting points: The object was sighted at an altitude between 5,000 to 6,000 feet,The sighting lasted approximately 35 miles,The object changed course around a mountain bend,There were comments suggesting the object might have been a balloon or aircraft, and it was described as possibly having varying colors.
witness description: air traffic controller at Pope AFB
